Row.Text: Unlock All Goody Rewards Immediately
All Goody Hut rewards will be available at the beginning of the game.
Normalized Goody Reward Chances
All Goody Hut rewards will have the same chance to roll.
Reveal All Goody Huts
Reveals the location of all Goody Huts at the beginning of the game.
Goody Hut Traders Add Capacity
Receiving a Trader as a Goody Hut reward will also grant +1 Trade Capacity.
Disable Goody Hut Moments
Disables the Moment Timeline that pops up when capturing a Goody Hut.
Goody Hut Notifications
Receive a notification upon receiving a Goody Hut reward.
[ SELECT ALL / NONE ]
Toggles selection of all or no goody types.
Goody Hut Frequency

Goody Hut Recon XP
Changes the experience that Recon units gain from Goody Huts.

Promotion
Goody Huts result in a guaranteed promotion for Recon units.
